title: How the UK's Most Valuable Tech Startup Revolut Plans to Crack America
description: Revolut's US CEO Ron Oliveira talks to Emily Nicolle at Financial News about the SoftBank-backed fintech firm's plans to reinvent the way Americans bank, after being valued at $33bn earlier this year.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Revolut's US CEO Ron Oliveira talks to Emily Nicolle at Financial News about the SoftBank-backed fintech firm's plans to reinvent the way Americans bank, after being valued at $33bn earlier this year.
